details.text: Global interconnect for 8 global loads and 4 global stores. Reduce number of global loads and stores to simplify global interconnect.
For 8 global loads and 4 global stores.

links.guide: Best Practices Guide : Global Memory Interconnect

details.text: This read-only memory contains information for the host about the system and about each kernel in the system, including kernel names, arguments, and attributes. The system description ROM ensures that the binary image on the FPGA is compatible with the host program.

Additional information.text: Requested size 524288 bytes, implemented size 2097152 bytes, replicated 4 times total, stallable, 2 reads and 2 writes.

details.text: Reduce the number of write accesses or fix banking to make this memory system stall-free. Banking may be improved by using compile-time known indexing on lowest array dimension.

Additional information.text: 4 independent copies of this memory were created to enable simultaneous execution of 4 loop iterations defined at  (%L)
You can reduce the number of copies of this memory by limiting the concurrency of its loop; see the OpenCL Programming Guide for details.
Banked on bit 6 into 2 separate banks.
Private memory implemented in on-chip block RAM.
